mapper.select: SELECT C_NAME, R_TYPE, O_ID, TO_CHAR(R_SDATE,'YY-MM-DD')AS R_SDATE ,TO_CHAR(R_EDATE,'YY-MM-DD')AS R_EDATE, PEOPLE, O_RCOUNT, CASE WHEN PD_TYPE='P' THEN '구매완료' WHEN PD_TYPE='R' THEN '환불완료' END AS PD_TYPE FROM ( SELECT C_NAME, R_TYPE, O_ID, R_SDATE, R_EDATE, PEOPLE, O_RCOUNT, PD_TYPE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN ROOM RO ON(R.R_ID=RO.R_ID) JOIN COMPANY C ON(RO.C_ID=C.C_ID) JOIN PAYMENT P ON(R.PA_ID=P.PA_ID) RIGHT JOIN PAY_DETAIL PD ON(P.PA_ID=PD.PA_ID) WHERE P.M_ID = #{mId}) ORDER BY O_ID DESC
